character

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • character.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Knight, Wizard

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class Character is the parent class that stores all the necessary variables that BOTH subclasses Wizard.java and Knight.java needs. These variables are: The character's 1.) Name 2.) Strength 3.) Dexterity 4.) Intelligence and 5.) Life. The purpose of having this parent class is to avoid having to retype the following codes more than once.
    Since:
    2019 - 02 - 07
